comments.author: Martijn Hendriks
comments.body: Here's a patch that adds the DataSources element to the DTD. It also changes the configuration a bit: instead of specifiying the logical name of a data source as a parameter element, it is now an attribute. This looks nicer I think.

description: The connection pooling feature from JCR-1456 introduced a new DataSource configuration element to Jackrabbit. It should be added to the repository config DTD.
summary: Add the new DataSource element to the repository DTD
